German (GR) | status = Active | genre = [[Computer Aided Design|CAD]] | license = Freeware | website = [http://ldd.LEGO.com/ ldd.LEGO.com] }} '''LEGO Digital Designer''', or '''LDD''', is a [[Freeware|free]] computer program produced by the [[Lego Group|LEGO Group]] as a part of [[Lego Design By Me|LEGO Design byME]]. It is available for [[Mac OS|Mac]] and [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] platforms. The program allows users to build models using virtual [[Lego|LEGO]] bricks, in a [[computer-aided design]] like manner. Through January 16, 2012, these can be uploaded, along with instructions and a box design, to the LEGO Design byME website, from where the models can be ordered for delivery as a real, packaged set. Users can also take "[[screenshots]]" of their models and [[Data storage device|store]] the models on their computer in a .LXF File. == Features == Only a subset of the bricks made by LEGO are available for use in LDD. LDD can generate build instructions automatically. == End of customized model delivery service == On November 9, 2011, Lego announced that the Design byME service will end on January 16, 2012, citing its complexity and failure to meet the company's quality expectations. A replacement is promised, but has not been announced. In its absence, custom brick orders will have to be made via the Pick a Brick service. The closing of Design byME will not affect the ability of LDD users to print custom instructions for their models.{{cite web|title=Changes to Design byME in January|url=http://designbyme.lego.com/en-us/news/default.aspx?id=302930|publisher=Lego|accessdate=2011-11-17|date=2011-10-09}} == References == == External links == *[http://designbyme.lego.com/ LEGO Design byME website] *[http://shop.lego.com/PAB/ Pick-A-Brick] *[http://ldd.lego.com/default.aspx/ LEGO Digital Designer Site] *[http://www.eurobricks.com/forum/index.php?s=5e232c01cc794bcbd24765171fd56954&showforum=128 Eurobricks LDD forum] for bug reports and feedback {{software-stub}} {{Lego}} [[Category:Lego]] [[Category:Mac OS X software]] [[Category:Windows software]] [[da:Lego Digital Designer]] [[es:Lego Digital Designer]] [[fr:Lego Digital Designer]] [[nl:Lego Digital Designer]] [[pt:LEGO Digital Designer]] [[fi:Lego Digital Designer]] [[zh:Lego Digital Designer]]
